abilities.name: Hextech Munitions
abilities.description: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are permanently modified to deal 20% AD physical damage and 80% AD magic damage.
abilities.damageType: Physical / Magic
descriptions: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are permanently modified to deal 20% AD physical damage and 80% AD magic damage.

Innate - The Package: After 8 minutes elapse,  The Package is delivered to both corners of Corki's fountain, which he can pick up after  channeling for 1 second. Doing so grants him  ghosting and one cast of  Special Delivery which must be cast before  Valkyrie within the next 60 seconds, as well as  40% bonus movement speed out of combat prior to the ability being cast, after which  The Package goes on  cooldown before being delivered again.
Corki cannot pick up the package while he is unable to cast abilities.

abilities.name: Phosphorus Bomb
abilities.description: Active: Corki launches a bomb at the target area that explodes upon impact, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
descriptions: Active: Corki launches a bomb at the target area that explodes upon impact, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
The bomb also  reveals the area and enemy  champions hit for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Active: Corki  dashes to the target location, dropping bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage Per Tick:»15 / 22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 (+ 10% AP)«Total Magic Damage:120 / 180 / 240 / 300 / 360 (+ 80% AP)
levelings: Magic Damage Per Tick:»15 / 22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 (+ 10% AP)«Total Magic Damage:120 / 180 / 240 / 300 / 360 (+ 80% AP)
descriptions: Active: Corki  dashes to the target location, dropping bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds.
These patches deal magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within.

abilities.name: Gatling Gun
abilities.description: Active: Corki sprays bullets in a frontal cone for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies hit, and reducing the target's  armor and  magic resistance with each tick, stacking up to 8 times, lingering for 2 seconds.
abilities.leveling: Mixed Damage Per Tick:»7.5 / 10.625 / 13.75 / 16.875 / 20 (+ 10% bonus AD)«Total Mixed Damage:120 / 170 / 220 / 270 / 320 (+ 160% bonus AD)Resistance Reduction Per Tick:»1 / 1.375 / 1.75 / 2.125 / 2.5«Total Resistance Reduction:8 / 11 / 14 / 17 / 20
abilities.damageType: Physical damage / Magic damage
levelings: Mixed Damage Per Tick:»7.5 / 10.625 / 13.75 / 16.875 / 20 (+ 10% bonus AD)«Total Mixed Damage:120 / 170 / 220 / 270 / 320 (+ 160% bonus AD)Resistance Reduction Per Tick:»1 / 1.375 / 1.75 / 2.125 / 2.5«Total Resistance Reduction:8 / 11 / 14 / 17 / 20
descriptions: Active: Corki sprays bullets in a frontal cone for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies hit, and reducing the target's  armor and  magic resistance with each tick, stacking up to 8 times, lingering for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Missile Barrage
abilities.description: Passive: Corki periodically stocks a missile ammo, up to a maximum of 7, and starts with 7 missile ammo every time he respawns.
descriptions: Passive: Corki periodically stocks a missile ammo, up to a maximum of 7, and starts with 7 missile ammo every time he respawns.
Active: Corki fires a missile in the target direction that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage in an area.
Every third missile Corki fires is a  Big One, dealing 100% increased damage with increased range and explosion radius.

name: Corki
title: the Daring Bombardier
blurb: The yordle pilot Corki loves two things above all others: flying, and his glamorous mustache... though not necessarily in that order. After leaving Bandle City, he settled in Piltover and fell in love with the wondrous machines he found there. He...
